The dress is comfortable, soft, and well-made, with customers describing it as a perfect holiday dress. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some find it lovely, others report issues with the chest area and low cut neckline. The color also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it beautiful while others say it's off. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This dress is perfect. The fit, style, and color are all stunning. And it is so comfortable. It is my new favorite dress. Read more
items.author: Laura H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute! Not too low cut.
items.body: This dress is for my 13 yod. So many of the dresses we saw are very short and very low cut or way too tight for a girl of 13, imo. She needed something with a bit of sparkle for a recital, and this fit the bill. It is a very flattering fit (we got the medium in the peacock color; my kiddo is 120 and 5'1), and I could see many body shapes wearing this style. She didn't have to put a cami underneath bc the material is thick enough not to show undergarments and also it is not too low cut. At a dinner we attended she wore this dress with shorts underneath so she could dance afterward w/o a worry. A great dress and comfortable enough that she will wear it more than once. Bonus. Read more
items.author: S. Youngberg

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but too large
items.body: Very pretty, well made dress, but returned due to small being too large. Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Wore this for a work event at a casino. It was super comfortable and flattering. It showed a little too much cleavage for a work event so I threw in a stitch to keep the cut higher for the night. But I took it out the next day. Love this dress. Read more
items.author: Melissa Mora

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Christmas Dress! ðŸŽ„
items.body: I dressed up as "The Christmas Witch" for our local Festival of Lights and Lighted Parade and the outfit was a huge success! Everyone loved it. Dress was absolutely perfect - I was even able to wear a bra even though it sits pretty far out on the shoulders. Dress is nice, velvet fabric and kept me pretty warm. Fit really well - I'm 5'3 and about 140 lbs and the medium was perfect. It does have some give and is very comfortable - and that's coming from a picky person. I also thought the long sleeves were excellent, as many times my shoulders and arms are cramped or won't fit in dresses made for people with very slim arms. I paired it with furry cuffs and leg warmers and a pair of lined tights, as well as a petticoat type thing to go underneath and add volume. Very much reminds me of something an ice skater would wear. Great dress! Read more
items.author: Chari

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but very low cut
items.body: The fabric of the dress is thick which I really like. The sparkle is in the dress not on it so it doesnâ€™t come off everywhere. Itâ€™s flattering and a good length on me and Iâ€™m 5â€™10.5â€. My only complaint is it is SO LOW cut. I tried several different bras, undershirts, and pinning it and none of it looked right. I am super bummed about that and will probably be returning due to the cut. Read more
items.author: Meghan Cuauhtli

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Not as sparkly as it shows and neckline is cut very low Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it, and I had to order twice
items.body: My first order was lost in shipping, so I had to order it twice. I was invested in this dress, and after waiting over a week I couldn't wait to try it on! Imagine my disappointment when I just can't get it to sit right... i'm 4'11" and about 155 lbs and I ordered an XL despite them telling me a L would fit me. They never do, i always size up. I'm a 36DDD, so I'm used to things being a bit strange on me. Well, this was totally bizarre. I'm used to the top being tight and the waist being loose, but this was the opposite. The arms are too long and the top was so loose I had to wear a specific bra for it to stay put. The waist actually fit perfectly, just snug enough to convince me the Large would be too small. It was also too long for my liking, but I'm short so that's a non issue, I hem most of my stuff anyway. I planned to wear this to dinner on a trip I'm taking with a friend. We were doing a velvet look, me in blue and him in red. Now because it took so long to arrive, I can't even TRY the Large because it'll come the day after we leave. So there goes that plan. For the price, I'm extremely disappointed. I've bought cheaper things on Amazon that fit way better. This is just bizarre. Read more
items.author: Anna Rivero

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Wine, Dustyrose, Navy, Peacockblue, Blue, Purple, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
